attributes.action: Save West Sussex Post Offices from closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are urging residents of the Observer newspaper circulation area to sign our petition which calls to maintain the current level of post office services in the Chichester, Bognor Regis and Midhurst and Petworth areas, and not close valued sub post offices. These community post offices are vital to the well-being of residents, particularly elderly people and parents of young children, by providing essential services and contributing to community life.
